name: Dicetris (emer4ld)
description:
A Tetris clone where the number of blocks the next piece is made of is determined by a roll of the dice.

Controls:

-Z - rotate left

-X/Up arrow - rotate right

-Down arrow - fast drop

-C - hold

Audio credit (no changes were made to the audio used):

-Rotate sound:  Freesound - n_audioman

-Place sound: Freesound - Mrthenoronha License: Creative Commons — Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International — CC BY-NC 4.0

-Line clear sound: Freesound - n_audioman License: Creative Commons Legal Code

-Hold sound: Freesound - connersaw8

-Game over sound: Freesound - Baltiyar13

-Background music: DSTechnician from Pixabay
